text: Robert Eugene Sykes (March 15, 1927 â€“ August 4, 2020) was an American football fullback in the National Football League for the Washington Redskins in 1952. He played college football at San Jose State. He was born in Oakland, California. Sykes died on August 4, 2020 in Laguna Niguel, California at the age of 93. ==References== Category:1927 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Sportspeople from Oakland, California Category:American football fullbacks Category:Washington Redskins players Category:Sportspeople from New Orleans
title: Bob Sykes (American football)
